pull_request.title: Fix nicochannel design websites social (/news page)
pull_request.body:
# Creating the pull request > Please include a summary of the change and which issue is fixed\ > If the related issue does not exist in our repository, please create it before making pull request\ > It is highly recommended to use our [Web Reporting Tool](https://kb.adguard.com/technical-support/reporting-tool) instead of creating an issue on GitHub directly\ > Please note, that we verify every pull request manually, so it may take time to apply it ## Prerequisites ### To avoid invalid pull requests, please check and confirm following terms - [x] This is not an ad/bug report; - [x] My code follows the [guidelines](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) and [syntax](https://kb.adguard.com/general/how-to-create-your-own-ad-filters) of this project; - [x] I have performed a self-review of my own changes; - [x] My changes do not break web sites, apps and files structure. ## What problem does the pull request fix? ### If the problem does not fall under any category that is listed here, please write a comment below in corresponding section - [ ] Missed ads or ad leftovers; - [ ] Website or app doesn't work properly; - [ ] AdGuard gets detected on a website; - [ ] Missed analytics or tracker; - [x] Social media buttons — share, like, tweet, etc; - [ ] Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc; - [ ] Filters maintenance. ## What issue is being fixed? ### Enter the issue address ### Add your comment and screenshots These websites have a common design with nicochannel.

The patch will be available in up to 4 hours.
After that time, you can download it by clicking `Check for filter updates...` in AdGuard tray menu.

List-KR 필터에 의해 해결되었습니다.
패치는 최대 4시간안에 사용하실 수 있습니다.
최대 4시간이 지난 후에 AdGuard 트레이 메뉴에 있는 `필터 업데이트 확인...`을 클릭하여 다운로드하실 수 있습니다.

</details>

Do not close AdGuard window until process of filters update will be finished (it may take about 30-60 seconds).

comment.body:
Cannot reproduce. In fact, a visitor using a non-Chinese IP address is redirected to a website using `www.bing.com` domain.

Adobe Flash Player has stopped being supported by Adobe. Please check the update of your Windows.
Also, please disable `Filter unblocking search ads and self-promotion`.

If you’re using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.

comment.body:
К сожалению, мы не можем воспроизвести проблему с вашими настройками.

Пожалуйста, попробуйте проверить обновления фильтров, возможно, проблема уже решена. Если вы по-прежнему не можете воспроизвести проблему, повторно откройте ее здесь. Мы будем признательны, если вы предоставите дополнительную информацию или скриншоты.

P.S. Возможно в настройках сети режим маршрутизации: proxy выставлен по ошибке, если это так, то измените, пожалуйста, на режим маршрутизации: локальный VPN.

issue.title: www.tumblr.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Annoyance) [https://www.tumblr.com/g5mlp/722197667027025920/the-entire-my-little-pony-2024-franchise-overview](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.tumblr.com%2Fg5mlp%2F722197667027025920%2Fthe-entire-my-little-pony-2024-franchise-overview) ### Comment Username: @DandelionSprout > While not logged in, an uncloseable login prompt when scrolling down on not only frontpages, but also very long individual posts nowadays. > > Since the mass exodus from Twitter to Tumblr seems to me personally like it'd warrant fast treatment, I'll let you guys borrow `www.tumblr.com#?##glass-container:has(p + p):has(a[href^="/auth/google?"])` from Dandelion Sprout's Annoyances List into AdGuard Popups Filters with no reservations or conditions of any kind. Alternately you guys can also use whichever entries you guys would write. > > The entry has worked for at least 2 months now, even if there still may be other Tumblr-side annoyances remaining (Most notably that the ••• buttons don't work after scrolling down slightly, which I never found a good fix for). ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adtidy.org/sitereports/3ile3nh8woe884w0k8gog4kw0k4gsg86bgh67exwww.png?nc=1)

comment.body: Note for testers: For browsers and browser profiles that have never visited Tumblr before, it can take some minutes/hours/days before they roll out the uncloseable prompt for that browser, instead of a small prompt with "Maybe later" near the bottom.

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Annoyance) [https://www.tumblr.com/g5mlp/722197667027025920/the-entire-my-little-pony-2024-franchise-overview](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.tumblr.com%2Fg5mlp%2F722197667027025920%2Fthe-entire-my-little-pony-2024-franchise-overview) ### Comment Username: @DandelionSprout > While not logged in, an uncloseable login prompt when scrolling down on not only frontpages, but also very long individual posts nowadays. > > Since the mass exodus from Twitter to Tumblr seems to me personally like it'd warrant fast treatment, I'll let you guys borrow `www.tumblr.com#?##glass-container:has(p + p):has(a[href^="/auth/google?"])` from Dandelion Sprout's Annoyances List into AdGuard Popups Filters with no reservations or conditions of any kind. Alternately you guys can also use whichever entries you guys would write. > > The entry has worked for at least 2 months now, even if there still may be other Tumblr-side annoyances remaining (Most notably that the ••• buttons don't work after scrolling down slightly, which I never found a good fix for). ### Screenshots
